<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> Arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets group behaviour mode & forces it to a group. If a unit is given as argument, behaviour is set for the unit's group. Behaviour is one of: 
* "CARELESS"
* "SAFE"
* "AWARE"
* "COMBAT"
* "STEALTH".
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> See [[AI Behaviour]] for details of the effect of this command on AI units.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> groupName [[setBehaviourStrong]] behaviour </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> groupName: [[Group]] or [[Object]] - unit from the group </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> behaviour: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_group1 [[setBehaviourStrong]] "SAFE";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Mission Editor: Waypoints#Behaviour|Behaviour description]], [[AIBehaviour]], [[behaviour]], [[setBehaviour]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[combatMode]], [[setCombatMode]], [[skill]], [[setSkill]], [[Arma 3 AI Skill]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
